description.full: Play as Dick Marcinko - real-life founder of SEAL Team Six and the US Navy's most efficient killing machine.  When a covert op behind the Iron Curtain leaves your team dead, it's up to you to finish the mission. Carve a path of destruction through North Korea and Soviet Russia using any means necessary in this action-packed first-person shooter.
